name: Edmodo
description: Edmodo's API makes it easy to develop compelling content and reach millions of teachers and students directly in their classrooms. Build apps that integrate with the core Edmodo feature set, including assignments, badges, and the gradebook. Gain insight into how users interact with your apps to better tailor them to the classroom experience. Market your apps to Edmodo's passionate and engaged teacher community.

apis.name: Edmodo
apis.description: Edmodo acts as a social network for educators and students, providing a secure environment to connect and collaborate, access homework and grades, share content, and engage in class discussions. Edmodo Platform provides independent developers and digital publishers access to the siteu00e2u0080u0099s suite of features, with the goal of developing an evolving catalog of apps and enabling deeper and broader functionality within the Edmodo platform.
